EmailTemplate.subject: Quick! Five extra spaces announced for NCS and Santander event
EmailTemplate.textOnly:
Hey {!Contact.FirstName}!
We've just had five extra spaces announced for an exclusive opportunity with the NCS Trust and Santander at amazing charity Only Connect. Details as follows:
What? Volunteering alongside executives from NCS Trust and Santandar (great chance to network!)
Where? Only Connect, 32 Cubitt Street, London, WC1X 0LR
When? This Friday, 10:00 to 14:00
How? Email us at tcs.northlondon@the-challenge.org by 12pm tomorrow, Tuesday 1st March
Places will be allocated on a first come, first served basis. We can provide a letter for any schools or colleges that need evidence of you missing lessons to volunteer.
Good luck!
Megan
WWW.TCSNORTHLONDON.CO.UK
